title: you have been disconnected from server please check your internet and try again
body: i started a game and i selected champion and when the client open it close and show me this result "you have disconnected please check your internet and try again   please i need help on that problem which happened after new update

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection to our servers.  This can cause you to desync in champion select and get left behind, or even fail to connection to your game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved for good.  Hopefully, you'll be back in game in no time!
